title: Episode 298: How do Treasury Bills Work?
itunes:title: Episode 298: How do Treasury Bills Work?
description:
People spend a lot of time talking about the debt and deficit, but most are unaware of the mechanics involved. This week, we cover some of those mechanics with a discussion of Treasury notes, bills, and bonds.
